Restart Quiz

Quit Quiz
Music:

Quiz Rules

Welcome to lightCity Bible Quiz.

This quiz is designed to help us measure and improve our growth of God’s Word.

Here are some things to know about the quiz:
  1. A Question can have multiple Answers (All Answers could be correct).
    1. If only one or two(in the case of more than two correct options) correct Answer is selected, the Question will be passed as failed.
  2. When an option(s) is selected, it is colored Yellow, at this point your Answer has not been comfirmed yet, you will need to click the confirm button at the bottom right of your screen to confirm your selection.
    1. Once the confirm button is clicked, your Anwser is locked, it cannot be undone.
    2. But before clicking the comfirm button, when the option(s) selected is still colored Yellow, you can un-select option(s) selected and select another option(s).
  3. If you do not know the Answer to a Question and do not wish to select any option(s), you can click the confirm button to show the right Answer.
    1. Please note that the Question will be passed as failed.
  4. Hints to Questions and Explanations to Answers are provided for some Questions.
    1. For Hints that are Scriptural references, click on the Scriptural reference to show the verse.
  5. You can change your settings such as Theme, Font and Music ON/OFF by clicking icon at the top of your screen.
  6. As you may have seen, there are two categories. CHILDREN and ADULTS categories, please feel free to choose any, as no knowlegde is a waste.
  7. You can review the Quiz after the Quiz has been completed by clicking the review button (it is very easy to see).
    1. The Quiz Review shows you the Questions and their Right Answer(s) and Explanations (for options that have one).
  1. Who is JesusThis Question has multiple Answers
    • A mere Man
    • The Son of Man
    • The Son of GOD
    • GOD'S Superior
  2. Who was the first Man Created?
    • Moses
    • Jesus
    • Adam
    • Judah
  3. GOD is a
    • Man
    • Spirit
    • Angel
    • Cherubim
  4. Who was the first Man to be Changed
    • Moses
    • Jesus
    • Melkezedek
    • Elijah
  5. Has any Man seen GOD?
    • All Men have seen GOD
    • GOD is invisible and cannot be seen
    • No
    • Two Men have seen GOD
  6. GOD created ____ on Day 6
    • Animals and Man
    • Fish and Birds
    • The Elements
    • Day and Night
  7. Who is the Mother of all the Living
    • Sarah
    • Racheal
    • Eve
    • Mary
  8. Is Swearing a Sin
    • Yes
    • No
  9. Which is the Oldest Covenant
    • The Old Covenant
    • The Abrahamic Covenant
    • The New Covenant
    • The Davidic Covenant
  10. When Adam left the Garden, He left the Presence of GOD
    • No
    • Yes
  11. GOD made all things through
    • Man
    • Angels
    • Jesus
    • He did it Himself
  12. Heading Covering is not important
    • No it is not
    • It is very important
    • It's our choice to make
    • The Doctrine is not for us
  13. Who is the Last Adam
    • Moses
    • Noah
    • Adam (the only Adam)
    • Jesus
  14. Jesus was born a
    • Spirit
    • Human Being (Flesh)
    • It's unknown
    • He was not born, he just came to the Earth
  15. Enoch surely died
    • Yes
    • No
  16. Who did Moses encounter at the Burning Bush
    • The Angel of Yahweh
    • GOD the Father
    • Hayah
    • Aaron
  17. What was David's sin in the matter of Bathsheba
    • Murder
    • Lie
    • Hypocrisy
    • Adultery
  18. The World was made by [Heb 11:3]
    • The Word of GOD
    • The wishes of the Angels
    • The great power of Heaven
    • The idea of Men
  19. Who is the maker of the New Jerusalem
    • Angel Gabriel
    • GOD
    • Men
    • Moses
  20. Is Moses an Apostle
    • Yes
    • No
  21. GOD _____ the _____ of His people
    • Is angry at, Bowing down
    • Inhabits, Praise
    • Glorfies, Truth
    • Delights in, Singing
  22. Women are to be silent in Church because
    • They are not talented
    • They are not to usurp authority
    • The Bible commands it
    • They cannot understand the Bible
  23. Women can lead worship in Church
    • No
    • Yes
  24. Why did Moses’ Mother keep Moses
    • She hoped for payment for raising Moses
    • Miriam needed another brother
    • She was a Woman of Faith
    • She saw He was no ordinary child
  25. Man looks at the _______, GOD looks at the ________
    • Heart, Outward
    • Character, Behaviour
    • Outward, Heart
    • Works, Faith

Quiz Rules

Welcome to lightCity Bible Quiz.

This quiz is designed to help us measure and improve our growth of God’s Word.

Here are some things to know about the quiz:
  1. A Question can have multiple Answers (All Answers could be correct).
    1. If only one or two(in the case of more than two correct options) correct Answer is selected, the Question will be passed as failed.
  2. When an option(s) is selected, it is colored Yellow, at this point your Answer has not been comfirmed yet, you will need to click the confirm button at the bottom right of your screen to confirm your selection.
    1. Once the confirm button is clicked, your Anwser is locked, it cannot be undone.
    2. But before clicking the comfirm button, when the option(s) selected is still colored Yellow, you can un-select option(s) selected and select another option(s).
  3. If you do not know the Answer to a Question and do not wish to select any option(s), you can click the confirm button to show the right Answer.
    1. Please note that the Question will be passed as failed.
  4. Hints to Questions and Explanations to Answers are provided for some Questions.
    1. For Hints that are Scriptural references, click on the Scriptural reference to show the verse.
  5. You can change your settings such as Theme, Font and Music ON/OFF by clicking icon at the top of your screen.
  6. As you may have seen, there are two categories. CHILDREN and ADULTS categories, please feel free to choose any, as no knowlegde is a waste.
  7. You can review the Quiz after the Quiz has been completed by clicking the review button (it is very easy to see).
    1. The Quiz Review shows you the Questions and their Right Answer(s) and Explanations (for options that have one).
